channel.title: [Help] Errror connecting to server
channel.description:
Problem explanation: I am trying to connect to my server [through MY ip AND no-ip address to test] (have already tried having friends test, they can't connect either) and I/we can't connect, but when I try to connect to my server through localhost..it works. When I click connect..nothing comes up on the runserver.bat window..its just a quick..error connecting to server.
EDIT: I AM USING A DODIAN BASED SOURCE -WITH MYSQL. THE MYSQL IS WORKING, I HAVE HAD USERS ON IT BEFORE AND EVERYTHING WENT FINE. -I am just now coming back to private servers and now nobody can connect. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 19, 2009, 01:18:49 pm[/size][hr]Anyone? -excuse the bump

item.title: [Help] Errror connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @fungame4u fungame4u
item.description:
@fungame4u wrote:

Problem explanation: I am trying to connect to my server [through MY ip AND no-ip address to test] (have already tried having friends test, they can’t connect either) and I/we can’t connect, but when I try to connect to my server through localhost…it works. When I click connect…nothing comes up on the runserver.bat window…its just a quick…error connecting to server.

EDIT: I AM USING A DODIAN BASED SOURCE -WITH MYSQL. THE MYSQL IS WORKING, I HAVE HAD USERS ON IT BEFORE AND EVERYTHING WENT FINE. -I am just now coming back to private servers and now nobody can connect. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 19, 2009, 01:18:49 pm[/size][hr]Anyone? -excuse the bump
